ImyaTweaks.Title: Features of HaciendaOverhaul: Expanded Hacienda Gameplay Changes

ImyaExpose.Description: This value sets the number of loading ramps for the Hacienda Warehouse
These values set the amount and type of workforce which is used as maintanence for the Hacienda Warehouse [0 - None, 1010366 - Jornaleros, 1010367 - Obreros, 5406 - Artistas]
Sets whether the Hacienda Sugar Cane Farm requires the fertility.
Sets whether the Hacienda Corn Farm requires the fertility.
Sets whether the Hacienda Coffee Farm requires the fertility.
Sets whether the Hacienda Caoutchouc Farm requires the fertility.
Sets whether the Hacienda Cacao Farm requires the fertility.
Production time of the Hacienda Spice Farm [in seconds]. The transporter range is not affected by this change.
Storage Amount of the Hacienda Spice Farm [in tons]
Production time of the Hacienda Hot Sauce Brewery [in seconds]. The transporter range is not affected by this change.
Storage Amount of the Hacienda Hot Sauce Brewery [in tons]
